virtualTable.name: test_geoserver_line
virtualTable.sql: select json_data , geo , (json_data::json->>'fclt_nm') as fclt_nm , layrId , case when geometrytype(geo) in ('LINESTRING', 'MUTILINESTRING') then 'LINE' when geometrytype(geo) in ('POINT', 'MUTIPOINT') then 'POINT' when geometrytype(geo) in ('POLYGON', 'MUTIPOLYGON') then 'POLYGON' else geometrytype(geo) end as geom_type , (json_data::json->>'color') as color , (json_data::json->>'weight') as weight , (json_data::json->>'capstyle') as capStyle , (json_data::json->>'joinstyle') as joinStyle , (json_data::json->>'dasharray') as dashArray , (json_data::json->>'opacity') as opacity , (json_data::json->>'zindex')::integer as zindex , coalesce(json_data::json->>'isoutline','false') as isOutline , (json_data::json->>'outlinecolor') as outlineColor , (json_data::json->>'outlineweight') as outlineWeight , (json_data::json->>'outlinecapstyle') as outlineCapStyle , (json_data::json->>'outlinejoinstyle') as outlineJoinStyle , (json_data::json->>'outlinedasharray') as outlineDashArray , (json_data::json->>'outlineopacity') as outlineOpacity from test_geoserver_line( CAST('%layernm%' AS text), COALESCE(NULLIF('%minx%','')::double precision,0.0), COALESCE(NULLIF('%miny%','')::double precision,0.0), COALESCE(NULLIF('%maxx%','')::double precision,0.0), COALESCE(NULLIF('%maxy%','')::double precision,0.0), COALESCE(NULLIF('%zoomlv%','')::integer,12), CAST('%sym_id%' AS text) )
